channel.title: Panpsychism on Art & Articles by Emin Mahrt

item.title: Panpsychisms: A Comparative Map
item.description: A long-form comparative article on panpsychism: micropsychism, panprotopsychism, cosmopsychism, qualia-force/space ideas, and major contemporary thinkers.
